entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning early this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then light late in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
